title: #1: PJ Evans & Junade Ali
location: Vulcan Works, 34-38 Guildhall Rd, Northampton, NN1 1EW

speakers.name: PJ Evans
speakers.bio: In the course of recent history fish have been relatively untroubled by the Internet of Things, but itâ€™s time for that to change. Armed only with a soldering iron, some JavaScript and ideas above his station, PJ will show us how you can build a simple IoT device and how the whole enterprise can spiral out of control. Highlights include a Scottish toilet emergency, an aquarium featuring military-grade security and an extinction-level event in the suburbs of Milton Keynes.

speakers.name: Junade Ali
speakers.role: Chief Executive Officer at Stealth Startup
